title: Missing at least 2 ward skins
body: One of which is the BE ward. I know there was a past issue with wards not showing up. Was just wondering if others were having the same issue.

replies.body:
That crazy BE seems to have disappeared for everyone (myself included DX) but no worries, it *IS* in fact still unlocked on your account. It just seems like the file that makes it show up in champ select is missing or something, hopefully, that'll be fixed up in the next patch!

Which other wards were you missing though? It doesn't look like anything is missing right now other than that BE ward not showing up in the client.
It must just be the BE ward haha. Thanks for the feedback! Just wanted to know if others were having the same issue and it wasn't something I did haha.
